member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Filtering.MedianFilter(System.Double[],System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.para: Median filter the input sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 对输入序列进行中值滤波。

member.param: 滤波器左侧元素数量，必须大于等于0
滤波器右侧元素数量，若小于0则等于左侧元素元素数量

summary.para: Filter the input sequence using a direct FIR filter specified by the fir coefficient.
Chinese Simplified: 使用FIR系数指定的直接型FIR滤波器，对输入序列进行滤波。
Filter the input sequence x by a direct type IIR filter specified by the reverse coefficient and the forward coefficient.
Chinese Simplified: 通过反向系数和前向系数指定的直接型IIR滤波器，对输入序列X进行滤波。
Filter the input sequence using zero phase filter without boundary extension.
Chinese Simplified: 使用零相位滤波器对输入序列进行滤波，未进行边界延拓。
Calculate the opposite number for each element in the array.
Chinese Simplified: 对数组中的每个元素求相反数。
Calculate the convolution of two one-dimensional input sequences using direct method of linear convolution.
Chinese Simplified: 计算两个一维输入序列的卷积，使用线性卷积的direct方法。
Calculate the autocorrelation of one-dimensional sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 计算一维输入序列的自相关。
Calculate the cross-correlation of two one-dimensional sequences using the direct method of linear convolution.
Chinese Simplified: 计算两个一维输入序列的互相关，使用线性卷积的direct方法计算。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.ZeroPadder(System.Double[],System.Boolean)

summary.para: Adjust the size of the input array of the input sequence to the next valid integer power of 2, and set the new tail element in the sequence to zero.
Chinese Simplified: 使输入序列输入数组的大小调整为下一个有效的2的整数次幂，序列中新增的尾部元素设为零。

member.param: 仅在数组大小不是2的幂时用0填充输入数组

summary.para: Delete the discontinuities whose absolute values exceed PI or 180 degree and expand the phase array.
Chinese Simplified: 删除绝对值超过pi或180的不连续部分，展开相位数组。
Delete the offset of the input signal x and scale the result so that the output sequence is in [–1:1].
Chinese Simplified: 删除输入信号X的偏移量并缩放结果，使输出序列在[–1:1]的区间。
Normalize the input vector according to the statistical distribution (µ, s) (µ is the mean and s is the standard deviation) to obtain the normalized vector with the statistical distribution of (0,1).
Chinese Simplified: 依据统计分布(µ,s)使输入向量归一化（µ是均值，s是标准差），得到统计分布为(0,1)的归一化向量。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.Upsample(System.Double[],System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.para: Upsample the input sequence by the upsampling factor.
Chinese Simplified: 通过升采样因子在输入序列中插入零。

member.param: 升采样因子，指两个采样间0的数目，必须大于0
升采样数组中前导零的数目，必须大于等于0并且小于升采样因子

summary.para: Downsample the input sequence by downsampling factor and averaging.
Chinese Simplified: 通过降采样因子和平均布尔控件，对输入序列进行降采样。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.Detrend(System.Double[],System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DetrendMethod,System.Int32)

summary.para: Detrend the input sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 对输入序列进行去趋势。

member.param: 去趋势的曲线拟合方法
拟合阶数，仅当detrendMethod为Polynomial时有效

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.WeightMovingAverage(System.Double[],SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.WeightAverageType,System.Double[])

summary.para: Weighted average the input sequence is to smooth the fluctuation, which is similar to low-pass filtering.
Chinese Simplified: 对输入序列进行权重平均以平滑波动，类似于低通滤波。

member.param: 用户定义权重数组，必须为奇数个元素的对称数组

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.ExponentialAverage(System.Double[],SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.WeightingFactors,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.ExponentialType,System.Int32,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SeasonType)

summary.para: Exponentially average the input sequence is to smooth the fluctuation, which is similar to low-pass filtering.
Chinese Simplified: 对输入序列进行指数平均以平滑波动，类似于低通滤波。

member.param: 季节模式的长度，仅当平均类型为Triple时有效
季节类型，仅当平均类型为Triple时有效

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.Resampling(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode)

summary.para: Resample the uniform input sequence with a new sampling rate, and the starting index position remains unchanged.
Chinese Simplified: 对均匀输入序列使用新的采样率进行重采样，起始索引位置不变。

member.param: 指定的输出序列的采样率

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Analog.Resampling(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode)

summary.para: Resample the non-uniform input sequence with a new sampling rate, and the starting index position remains unchanged.
Chinese Simplified: 对非均匀输入序列使用新的采样率进行重采样，起始索引不变。

member.param: 指定的输出序列的采样率

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Digital.GetDigitalSize(System.Byte[0:,0:],System.Int32@,System.Int32@)

summary.para: Returns the number of samples and signals contained in the digital input.
Chinese Simplified: 返回数字输入中包含的采样和信号的数量。

member.param: 输入数字信号，通道按列排列
返回数字输入包含的数字数据的采样数据元素的数目
返回数字输入中包含的信号元素数目

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Digital.DigitalToBool(System.Byte[0:,0:],System.Boolean[0:,0:]@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Mode)

summary.para: Converts a digital signal into a two-dimensional Boolean array.
Chinese Simplified: 将数字信号转换为二维布尔数组。

member.param: 输入数字信号，通道按列排列
对数据进行的转换从最低有效位(LSB)或最高有效位(MSB)开始，默认为LSB

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SignalOperation.Digital.BoolToDigital(System.Boolean[0:,0:],System.Byte[0:,0:]@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Mode)

summary.para: Converts a two-dimensional Boolean array to a digital signal.
Chinese Simplified: 将二维布尔数组转换为数字信号。

member.param: 转换后数字信号，通道按列排列
对数据进行的转换从最低有效位(LSB)或最高有效位(MSB)开始，默认为LSB

summary.para: Reverse the digital data in the input digital so that 0 convert 1 (or 1 convert 0).

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DataFormat
member.summary: 数字信号使用的二进制表示法

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DataFormat.UnsignedBinary
member.summary: 无符号二进制：将数据转换为无符号二进制

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DataFormat.OffsetBinary
member.summary: 二进制偏移量：最大的负值的每一位均为0，而最大的正值的每一位均为1。 最高有效位后全部为0表示0（例如，二进制1000）

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DataFormat.Two_Complement
member.summary: 二进制补码：使用二进制补码格式，是表示带符号二进制值的常用格式。 该格式与二进制偏移相似，但是最高有效位是相反的

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Normalization
member.summary: 用于计算自相关的归一化方法

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode
member.summary: 重采样使用的插值算法

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode.Linear
member.summary: 指定每个输出采样值为两个时间上最接近的输入采样的线性插值

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode.Spline
member.summary: 使用样条插值算法计算重采样值

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.InterpolationMode.FIRFilter
member.summary: 使用有限长冲激响应(FIR)滤波算法计算重采样值

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.DetrendMethod
member.summary: 去趋势的曲线拟合方法

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SeasonType.Multiplicative
member.summary: 乘性，幅度随时间而增加

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SeasonType.Additive
member.summary: 加性，幅度随时间保持不变

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.WeightingFactors.Level
member.summary: 水平累积量，大小在0和1之间，默认值为0.2

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.WeightingFactors.Trend
member.summary: 趋势累积量，大小在0和1之间，默认值为0.2，仅当指数平均类型为Double或Triple时有效

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.WeightingFactors.Season
member.summary: 季节累积量，大小在0和1之间，默认值为0.2，仅当指数平均类型为Triple时有效

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SystemNoiseCalculation.CalculateSystemNoise(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculate System Noise In Target Band ( Frequency Domain Method ). No DC.
member.param: Start frequency( FFT result bin0 and bin1 removed )

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SystemNoiseCalculation.CalculateSystemNoise(System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculate System Noise ( Time Domain Method ). No DC.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.SystemNoiseCalculation.ComponentsLevelCaculation(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double[]@,System.Int32)
member.param: the waveform of input signal assuming in voltage
the calculated peak tone frequency in the range of search
total harmonic distortion in scale = sqrt(sum(harmonics power) / fundamental power)
in voltage peak which is 1.414*rms, [0]for DC [1] for fundamental
the highest order to analysis, if too high, the exceeded harmonics level will be 0

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.HarmonicAnalysis.CalculateSystemNoise(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculate System Noise In Target Band ( Frequency Domain Method ). No DC.
member.param: Start frequency( FFT result bin0 and bin1 removed )

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.HarmonicAnalysis.CalculateSystemNoise(System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculate System Noise ( Time Domain Method ). No DC.

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.MedianFilter
member.summary: The Median Filter is a non-linear digital filtering technique, often used to remove noise from a signal.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.MedianFilter.Process(System.Double[],System.Int32)
member.summary: The block uses the sliding window method to compute the moving median. In this method, a window of specified length moves sample by sample, and the block computes the median of the data in the window. This block performs median filtering on the input data over time.
member.param: Median filter window length, it should be 2N+1, and >=3

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Phase.CalPhaseShift(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculate the phase shift between two input waveform arrays, return value will be between -180° and 180°.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Phase.CalPhaseShift(System.Single[],System.Single[])
member.summary: Calculate the phase shift between two input waveform arrays, return value will be between -180° and 180°.
member.returns: phase shift in unit of degree

member.summary: Perform substraction on two phase value, unit in radian. Thre result will be wrapped to range [-Pi, Pi] (*)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.ToneAnalyzer.FFTPeakCorrection(System.Numerics.Complex[])

summary.para: Synchronize method that makes all the input channels simultaneous.
This method only applies to bandlimited signal such as sinusoidal waveform.
Note:
1 Array size should be numberOfChannels * SamplesPerChannel.
2 Size of return array will be smaller than input array because of settlepoints truncation.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.Synchronizer.Sync(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double)

summary.para: Synchronize method that makes all the input channels simultaneous.
This method only applies to bandlimited signal such as sinusoidal waveform.
Note:
1 Array size should be numberOfChannels * SamplesPerChannel.
2 Size of return array will be smaller than input array because of settlepoints truncation.

member.param: number of points you want to shift
